blocks.name: letrp1
blocks.content: A transitive property of 'less than or equal' and plus 1. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm letrp1(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
} = {
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  3impia(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  mpan2d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wbr(c1, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  ltp1(c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cr)))
  ancli(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cr))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cr), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  lelttr(c0, c1, co(c1, caddc, nat1))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wi(wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wi(wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wbr(c0, cle, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cr))
  peano2re(c1)
  ltle(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1))
}

blocks.name: recgt0
blocks.content: The reciprocal of a positive number is positive. Exercise 4 of [Apostol] p. 21. (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm recgt0(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wn(wo(wceq(nat0, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0))))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wn(wo(wceq(nat0, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0))), wn(wceq(nat0, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), wn(wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  neneqd(nat0, co(nat1, cdiv, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  necomd(nat0, co(nat1, cdiv, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  recne0d(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  mtoi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0), wbr(nat1, clt, nat0))
  ax-mp(wn(wbr(nat1, clt, nat0)), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  0lt1()
  ltnsymi(nat0, nat1)
  1re()
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0), wbr(nat1, clt, nat0))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)), wbr(nat1, clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(nat1)))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, cneg(nat1), co(cneg(co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), cmul, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  mulgt0d(cneg(co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  renegcld(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  rereccld(c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0))
  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0))
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0))
  lt0neg1d(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0))
  eqtrd(co(cneg(co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), cmul, c0), cneg(nat1), cneg(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cmul, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  mulneg1d(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  reccld(c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  negeqd(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cmul, c0), nat1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  recid2d(c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0), wcel(c0, cc))
  recnd(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0), wne(c0, nat0))
  lt0neg1d(nat1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  1red(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))
  ioran(wceq(nat0, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wn(wo(wceq(nat0, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), clt, nat0)))), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr))
  0re()
  rereccld(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  gt0ne0(c0)
  axlttri(nat0, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))
}

blocks.name: prodgt0
blocks.content: Infer that a multiplicand is positive from a nonnegative multiplier and positive product. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm prodgt0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
} = {
  imp32(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wo(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wceq(nat0, c0)))
  leloed(nat0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  0red(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  jaod(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wceq(nat0, c0), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)))
  exp32(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, c1, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
  mulgt0d(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(nat1, cdiv, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
  rereccld(c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))
  recgt0(c0)
  eqtr3d(co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), c1, co(co(c0, cmul, c1), cdiv, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
  divrecd(co(c0, cmul, c1), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
  recnd(co(c0, cmul, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
  remulcld(c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1))))
  divcan3d(c0, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1))), wcel(c1, cc))
  recnd(c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1))))
  gt0ne0d(c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  syl5ibcom(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(nat0, c0), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)))
  pm2.21d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  mtbiri(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, nat0))
  ltnri(nat0)
  0re()
  breq2d(nat0, clt, co(nat0, cmul, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  mul02d(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  recnd(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  imbi1d(wceq(nat0, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(nat0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  breq2d(nat0, clt, co(nat0, cmul, c1), co(c0, cmul, c1), wceq(nat0, c0))
  oveq1(nat0, c0, cmul, c1)
}

blocks.name: prodgt02
blocks.content: Infer that a multiplier is positive from a nonnegative multiplicand and positive product. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm prodgt02(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
} = {
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1))), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  sylan2d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmul, c0)))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmul, c0)))
  breq2d(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c1, cmul, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c1, cmul, c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  mulcom(c0, c1)
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmul, c0))), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmul, c0))), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  prodgt0(c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: ltmul1a
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ ltmul1 . Multiplication of both sides of 'less than' by a positive number. Theorem I.19 of [Apostol] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltmul1a(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmul, c2), clt, co(c1, cmul, c2)))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmul, c2), clt, co(c1, cmul, c2)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2))))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, co(co(c1, cmul, c2), cmin, co(c0, cmul, c2)), co(co(c1, cmin, c0), cmul, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  mulgt0d(co(c1, cmin, c0), c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  resubcld(c1, c0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  mpbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, cmin, c0)), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  simpr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  posdifd(c0, c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  simpl3r(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  subdird(c1, c0, c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  recnd(c0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  recnd(c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  posdifd(co(c0, cmul, c2), co(c1, cmul, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  remulcld(c0, c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  remulcld(c1, c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2)), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
  simpl3l(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, c1))
}

blocks.name: ltmul1
blocks.content: Multiplication of both sides of 'less than' by a positive number. Theorem I.19 of [Apostol] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ltmul1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmul, c2), clt, co(c1, cmul, c2))))
} = {
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmul, c2), clt, co(c1, cmul, c2)))

  syl(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wi(wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), clt, co(co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))

  mpancom(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wb(wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), clt, co(co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cmul, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cr))
  syl(wbr(nat0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cr), wne(co(c1, caddc, nat1), nat0))

thm ltmul12ad(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  syl22anc(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmul, c1), clt, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c3)))
